channel.title: Homes on Motonari Kambara
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Motonari Kambara

item.description: I am Motonari Kambara. I am a Research Fellow in SMI Lab at Keio University. My academic and research interests are deeply rooted in the intersection of Embodied AI, Vision and Language (V&L), as well as the development and application of domestic service robots.
